member.name: T:CommandLine.MissingValueOptionError
member.summary: Models an error generated when an option lacks its value.

member.name: T:CommandLine.UnknownOptionError
member.summary: Models an error generated when an unknown option is detected.

member.name: T:CommandLine.MissingRequiredOptionError
member.summary: Models an error generated when a required option is required.

member.name: T:CommandLine.MutuallyExclusiveSetError
member.summary: Models an error generated when a an option from another set is defined.

member.name: T:CommandLine.BadFormatConversionError
member.summary: Models an error generated when a value conversion fails.

member.name: T:CommandLine.SequenceOutOfRangeError
member.summary: Models an error generated when a sequence value lacks elements.

member.name: T:CommandLine.BadVerbSelectedError
member.summary: Models an error generated when an unknown verb is detected.

member.name: T:CommandLine.HelpRequestedError
member.summary: Models an error generated when a user explicit requests help.

member.name: T:CommandLine.HelpVerbRequestedError
member.summary: Models an error generated when a user explicit requests help in verb commands scenario.

member.summary: Verb command string.

member.name: P:CommandLine.HelpVerbRequestedError.Type
member.summary: of verb command.

member.name: P:CommandLine.HelpVerbRequestedError.Matched
member.summary: true if verb command is found; otherwise false.

member.name: T:CommandLine.NoVerbSelectedError
member.summary: Models an error generated when no verb is selected.

member.name: T:CommandLine.OptionAttribute
member.summary: Models an option specification.

member.name: M:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The default long name will be inferred from target property.

member.name: M:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The long name of the option.

member.name: M:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.#ctor(System.Char,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The short name of the option.
The long name of the option or null if not used.

member.name: M:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.#ctor(System.Char)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The short name of the option..

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.LongName
member.summary: Gets long name of this command line option. This name is usually a single english word.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.ShortName
member.summary: Gets a short name of this command line option, made of one character.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.Required
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a command line option is required.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.SetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the option's mutually exclusive set name.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.Min
member.summary: When applied to properties defines the lower range of items.
member.remarks: If not set, no lower range is enforced.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.Max
member.summary: When applied to properties defines the upper range of items.
member.remarks: If not set, no upper range is enforced.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets mapped property default value.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.HelpText
member.summary: Gets or sets a short description of this command line option. Usually a sentence summary.

member.name: P:CommandLine.OptionAttribute.MetaValue
member.summary: Gets or sets mapped property meta value. Usually an uppercase hint of required value type.

member.name: T:CommandLine.Parser
member.summary: Provides methods to parse command line arguments.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, configurable with using a delegate.
member.param: The delegate used to configure aspects and behaviors of the parser.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Parser.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Parser.ParseArguments``1(System.String[])
member.summary: Parses a string array of command line arguments constructing values in an instance of type . Grammar rules are defined decorating public properties with appropriate attributes.
member.typeparam: Type of the target instance built with parsed value.
member.param: A array of command line arguments, normally supplied by application entry point.
member.returns: A containing an instance of type with parsed values and a sequence of .
member.exception: Thrown if one or more arguments are null.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Parser.ParseArguments``1(System.Func{``0},System.String[])
member.summary: Parses a string array of command line arguments constructing values in an instance of type . Grammar rules are defined decorating public properties with appropriate attributes.
member.typeparam: Type of the target instance built with parsed value.
member.param: A delegate used to intitalize the target instance.
A array of command line arguments, normally supplied by application entry point.
member.returns: A containing an instance of type with parsed values and a sequence of .
member.exception: Thrown if one or more arguments are null.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Parser.ParseArguments(System.String[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Parses a string array of command line arguments for verb commands scenario, constructing the proper instance from the array of types supplied by . Grammar rules are defined decorating public properties with appropriate attributes. The must be applied to types in the array.
member.param: A array of command line arguments, normally supplied by application entry point.
A array used to supply verb alternatives.
member.returns: A containing the appropriate instance with parsed values as a and a sequence of .
member.exception: Thrown if one or more arguments are null.
Thrown if array is empty.
member.remarks: All types must expose a parameterless constructor. It's stronly recommended to use a generic overload.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Parser.Dispose
member.summary: Frees resources owned by the instance.

member.name: P:CommandLine.Parser.Default
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance created with basic defaults.

member.name: P:CommandLine.Parser.Settings
member.summary: Gets the instance that implements in use.

member.name: T:CommandLine.ParserSettings
member.summary: Provides settings for . Once consumed cannot be reused.

member.name: M:CommandLine.ParserSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommandLine.ParserSettings.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizes an instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommandLine.ParserSettings.Dispose
member.summary: Frees resources owned by the instance.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ParserSettings.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether perform case sensitive comparisons.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ParserSettings.ParsingCulture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture used when parsing arguments to typed properties.
member.remarks: Default is invariant culture, .

member.name: P:CommandLine.ParserSettings.HelpWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the used for help method output. Setting this property to null, will disable help screen.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ParserSettings.IgnoreUnknownArguments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parser shall move on to the next argument and ignore the given argument if it encounter an unknown arguments
member.value: true to allow parsing the arguments with different class options that do not have all the arguments.
member.remarks: This allows fragmented version class parsing, useful for project with add-on where add-ons also requires command line arguments but when these are unknown by the main program at build time.

member.name: T:CommandLine.Text.AssemblyLicenseAttribute
member.summary: Models a multiline assembly license text.

member.name: T:CommandLine.Text.MultilineTextAttribute
member.summary: Provides base properties for creating an attribute, used to define multiple lines of text.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.MultilineTextAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used in derived type using one line of text.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.MultilineTextAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used in type using two lines of text.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used in type using four lines of text.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used in type using five lines of text.

member.summary: Returns the last line with text. Preserves blank lines if user intended by skipping a line.
member.returns: The last index of line of the non-blank line.

member.value: A string of all non-blank lines.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying author and year.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.HelpText.AutoBuild``1(CommandLine.ParserResult{``0},System.Func{CommandLine.Text.HelpText,CommandLine.Text.HelpText},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class using common defaults.
member.returns: An instance of class.
member.param: The containing the instance that collected command line arguments parsed with class.
A delegate used to customize the text block of reporting parsing errors text block.
If true the output style is consistent with verb commands (no dashes), otherwise it outputs options.
member.remarks: The parameter is not ontly a metter of formatting, it controls whether to handle verbs or options.

member.name: M:CommandLine.Text.HelpText.AutoBuild``1(CommandLine.ParserResult{``0})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class, automatically handling verbs or options scenario.
member.param: The containing the instance that collected command line arguments parsed with class.
member.returns: An instance of class.
member.remarks: This feature is meant to be invoked automatically by the parser, setting the HelpWriter property of .

member.name: P:CommandLine.Text.SentenceBuilder.HelpCommandText
member.summary: Get a delegate that returns the help text of helo command. The delegates should accept a boolean that is equal true for options; otherwise false for verbs.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a command line option is required.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ValueAttribute.Min
member.summary: When applied to properties defines the lower range of items.
member.remarks: If not set, no lower range is enforced.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ValueAttribute.Max
member.summary: When applied to properties defines the upper range of items.
member.remarks: If not set, no upper range is enforced.

member.name: P:CommandLine.ValueAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets mapped property default value.
